guide.conclusion: We hoped you enjoy our project! For more tutorials, videos, and community interaction, check us out at facebook/sewingpartsonline or twitter@sewingparts

flags.title: User-Contributed Project
flags.text: This project guide is not managed by MAKE staff.

guide.introduction: Hey, Everyone! I'm Sarah with http://www.sewingpartsonline.com and we've bought you an original tutorial that is mommy and eco-friendly. Happy Sewing!
guide.introduction_rendered: Hey, Everyone! I'm Sarah with http://www.sewingpartsonline.com and we've bought you an original tutorial that is mommy and eco-friendly. Happy Sewing!
guide.summary: In this tutorial, we show you how to deconstruct a Men's Dress Shirt in to a unique kid's vest.
guide.title: Men's Dress Shirt into Kid's Vest
